name: GOB (itch) (Rona Hattingh)
description:
Mantis has been caught by a fire-ant colony, food for their young.

Help Mantis escape, destroy your enemy with your toxic spit, but be careful, your spit is also dangerous to yourself.

 Increase your health by eating ant eggs. 

HOW TO PLAY?

Movement - WASD

Run - LEFT SHIFT

Jump - SPACE

Spit - LEFT MOUSE

Action(Eating eggs) - E

Pause Menu - ESC

CREDITS:

Thank you to all the artist who contributed to the production of this game.

TO THE PLAYER ...

Thank you for playing my game, I hope you enjoy it!

Lots of 'spitty' love,

Rona Hattingh
